description: Claude Code skill: Install Termux + OpenClaw on Android and connect to WhatsApp (with China GFW bypass)

claude.name: termux-openclaw-android
claude.description: Install Termux and OpenClaw on Android (Xiaomi/MIUI), fix koffi ARM64 native module, configure Z.ai GLM models, and connect WhatsApp with GFW bypass via ADB port-forward + Node.js proxy injection. Use when user wants to set up OpenClaw on an Android phone, especially in China.
